forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. Southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As night gracefully embraces Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere remains predominantly clear, the star-speckled sky offering a hint of tranquility with a low temperature hovering around 50 degrees. The gentle breeze from the southwest creates a refreshing whisper, perfect for those taking evening strolls along the city’s inviting waterfront. The forecast for tomorrow promises a cheerful canvas of mostly sunny skies, with peaks reaching near 60 before dipping slightly as the afternoon unfolds. A mild wind from the west southwest will accompany the day, adding a layer of pleasantness to the already inviting weather.

Tonight's clarity suggests the absence of fog, allowing the iconic silhouette of the Golden Gate to impress its viewers without interference. This rare visibility lends itself beautifully to an evening out: perhaps savoring a quiet meal at an outdoor café or luxuriating in the closing notes of another day while perched upon one of the city’s scenic hills. As tomorrow dawns, layers will be your ally, balancing the fresh morning chill with the warmth of the afternoon sun. A light jacket and comfortable attire will provide both comfort and style as you embrace the city's charm. Whether wandering through the vibrant streets or enjoying the serene vistas at a park, the atmosphere beckons for moments of both movement and reflection.
